arabic.title: Change My Heart O God (Arabic) غيرن قلبي

english.title: Change my heart O God
text: So that it becomes like yours
You are the Potter*, I'll come to you
I am ceramics in your hands

arabic.title: Jesus Lover Of My Soul (Arabic) يسوع فادي حياتي

english.title: Jesus Lover Of My Soul
text: Jesus, I will never let you go
You've taken me from the miry clay
You've set my feet upon the Rock, and now I know
I love you, I need you,
Though my world may fall, I' ll never let you go
I will worship you until the very end

arabic.title: Mary Did You Know? (Arabic) هل كنت تعلمين؟
text: هل كنت تعلمين أن ابنك يسوع
أه هل تعلمين أن ابنك الحبيب

english.title: Mary Did You Know?
text: Did you know that your son Jesus
would one day walk on water?
Ah, did you know that your beloved son
Or did you know that Jesus
Came to give us the sacrifice?
Did you know that your kind son
Will give sight to the blind?
That he will calm the storm with His hand?
Or did you know that all angels
And when you kiss kiss him
you kissed the face of God?
The blind will see, the deaf will hear
and the dead will live again
The lame will leap, the dumb will always speak,
Did you know that your newborn
Son is Lord of all creation?
Or did you know that the baby
Will one day rule the nations?
Did you know that your son

arabic.title: أبانا نرفع إسمك
text: أبانا نرفع اسمك الكريم، أبانا نحمد حبك العظيم
أنت ربنا ونشيد حمدنا نسجد لك
ترنيم الطيور يحكي حبك، ترفع الصخور صوت صبحك
نسبح اسمك ليلا ونهارا، أنت الهنا قدوس وبار
نحمد اسمك ونعلي شخصك، نسجد لك

english.title: Father, we lift your name
text: Father, we lift your name, father, we praise your glorious love
you are our lord, and our praising hymn is to kneel before you
the birds chirp with your love, rocks sing your morning prayer loudly
we praise your name night and day, you are our lord, holy and righteous
we praise your name and glorify you, we kneel to you

english.title: Your doors are open
text: O' God, how come your mercy
O' God, how come your mercy
your doors are open to me
no matter how many sins I've committed
I love how you conceal my flaws
and keep my feet steady on a rock
you've engraved a hymn in my heart
I will spend my life seeking your glory
all of you who are suffering, come hither

english.title: The Lord is my shepherd
text: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing
He makes me lie down in green pastures,
he leads me beside quiet waters,
Surely your goodness and love will follow me
and I will dwell in the house of the Lord
Surely your goodness and love will follow me
and I will dwell in the house of the Lord

english.title: God, I want to sing a hymn for you
text: you came down from the sky to our earth
from our land to the cross
you took away all the suffering
you were hung on the cross
but to the sky you've risen
God, I want to sing a hymn for you
God, I want to sing a hymn for you
I want to repent and hold your name up high
you bring the joy to my heart
the joy of your redemption for me
you came down from the sky to our earth
from our land to the cross
you took away all the suffering
you were hung on the cross
but to the sky you've risen
God, I want to sing a hymn for you

arabic.title: زيك مفيش
text: ضاع من عمري واخاف من ايه
زيك مفيش بالحب يملك عرش القلوب

english.title: No one Like You
text: When I'm in Your hands, oh, my God
Time was wasted from my life but what could I possibly fear
as long as You are with me?
There is no one like You, who can own the throne of all hearts
And Your beauty reigns in us despite our flaws
When I get closer to You, I change
I become more beautiful with you
You manifest Yourself in me and I grow in You
You own my heart, oh, my God
My life with You has true meaning

english.title: hold me close to you
text: to come into your house in the multitude of your mercy
because you've opened the door to me by your mercy
allow me to ask for your permission to sit down with you
God, let me get to know you
and take me to a new depth
I won't stand still in my place
I won't wait until you call upon me again
I just want to see you and touch you
I will wait for you to speak
I will change everyday and glorify you

arabic.title: عشت كتير لنفسي
text: مش عايز غير اللى انت عايزه

english.title: I Lived for myself a lot
text: I Lived for myself a lot
as if I was living by myself
I wanted people to serve me
and my god to bless me
that you died for my sake
I only want what you want
I want to see what you see
I want to dream of whatever you want
take my hand and my foot
I want to live for you only
my god, I seek your glory
I want to follow your steps
you're my god and I'm your slave
I want to hear your voice

arabic.title: عمانوئيل عمانوئيل
text: شعبك يعلن بيك إيمانه ويتمسك بوعودك
انت راعينا وكل ما لينا وبتغمرنا بجودك
مهما اشتدت حرب علينا اعلان روحك فينا
انك لينا ومين يكفينا غيرك انت يا فادينا

english.title: Immanuel, Immanuel
text: "Your people declare their faith, holding onto your promises
You are our shepherd and precious, covering us in your grace
Whenever war toughens on us, Your Spirit’s manifestation is in us
You are ours, and who could satisfy us But You, our Savior?
You teach us your word, a Lamp to our feet
Your Spirit in us comforts us, and enlightens our eyes

english.title: In Your Warm Embrace
text: I stay in your warm embrace, oh, Jesus
I throw myself onto your chest and rest
You heal me and fill me with praise for God
You let me drink from your spring
And fill me with your love
You make me feel your warmth

english.title: How Great Are You
text: And with your spirit, you missed me
And who can separate me from it?1

english.title: We sing glory
text: we sing glory to the Lord God

arabic.title: ها آتي بطيبي
text: إذ كسرت قلبك من أجلي أنا
لا يكن في قلبي شريك لك
و أسعى ضعيفا و أستند عليك
دعني أكرم اسمك و أرفعه الآن
لئلا تمضي الفرصة و ينتهي الزمان

english.title: Ha ati bitibi  ها آتي بطيبي Here I come with my goodness
text: la yakun fi qalbi sharik lak
liyalaa tamdi alfursat w yantahi alzaman
Behold, I will bring my goodness over your hair
Let me know right now your destiny
Instead of a spiny in your wreath
And lean my head on your chest
You broke your heart for me
Here's a bottle of good that I break here
At your feet and anoint them
Where my comfort neither nor about us
Don't be in my heart partner for you
You have all my love for you alone
And break my heart to satisfy your heart
And all my desires in your glory
Let me damage myself at your feet
And I always have your eyes filled
I seek weak and lean on you
Even all glory come back to you
Let me honor your name and raise it now
Lest the opportunity pass and the time ends
And good Mariam missed the time

arabic.title: وسط خوفي
text: يا إلهي يا حبيبي ياللي معنى حياتى فيك
عمري كله ما يساويش إلا لو كان بين إيديك
إنت واهب اللي لي ، انت خالق قلبي في
ليه هاعيش لو مش معاك ثمن حياتي كان دماك
إيه هحتاج وانت معايا ، إنت لي إنت الكفاية
وسط همي وقت ضيقى ف كل مرة بانادي عليك
لي مين غيرك بيسمع ، لي مين باجرى عليه
وسط همي وقت ضيقى ف كل مرة بانادي عليك
لي مين غيرك بيسمع ، لي مين باجرى عليه
إنت واهب اللي لي ، انت خالق قلبي في
ليه هاعيش لو مش معاك ثمن حياتي كان دماك
إيه هحتاج وانت معايا ، إنت لي إنت الكفاية
إنت واهب اللي لي ، انت خالق قلبي في.
ليه هاعيش لو مش معاك ثمن حياتي كان دماك
إيه هحتاج وانت معايا ، إنت لي إنت الكفاية

english.title: Amidst My Fears
text: My beloved God, You are the one who gives my life a meaning
My existence would not be worth living if not between Your hands
Amidst my fears, You are my hope
Amidst my sorrows, You are my happiness
You are my Donor, You created my heart
What's the point of living without You? The price of my life was Your blood
There is nothing I need when I am with You, You are enough for me.
Amidst my worries, in tough times, I call out for You
There is nobody but You who listens to me, there is nobody but You I can run to.
Amidst my worries, in tough times, I call out for You
There is nobody but You who listens to me, there is nobody but You I can run to.
Amidst my fears, You are my hope
Amidst my sorrows, You are my happiness
You are my Donor, You created my heart
What's the point of living without You? The price of my life was Your blood
There is nothing I need when I am with You, You are enough for me.
Amidst my fears, You are my hope
Amidst my sorrows, You are my happiness
You are my Donor, You created my heart
What's the point of living without You? The price of my life was Your blood
There is nothing I need when I am with You, You are enough for me.

english.title: During my Times of Hardship
text: I always call upon you every time
Who would listen to me other than you?
When I am scared, you are safety
You are my happiness through sad times
You bestowed upon me all I have
You have created my heart in me
Why would I live if I'm not with you?
The price of my life was your blood
What else would I need when you are by my side
